TENCENTWEIBO_FOOTER: Applications that have requested access to your Tencent Weibo account will appear here.

TWITTER_FOOTER: Applications that have requested access to your Twitter account will appear here.
CALENDARS_FOOTER: Applications that have requested access to your calendars will appear here.
PHOTOS_HEADER_IPOD: Photos stored on your iPod touch may contain other information, such as when and where the photo was taken.
REMINDERS_FOOTER: Applications that have requested access to your reminders will appear here.
